name: Pollution Overload
title: Most Polluted Air
description: In 2017, 100% of Kenya's population was exposed to PM2.5 pollution levels exceeding the WHO's Interim Target-3 and guideline values, indicating severe air quality issues.

name: Economic Stability
title: Strong Macroeconomic Management
description: Kenya achieved a macroeconomic management rating of 4.5 in 2023, reflecting a robust economic framework and fiscal discipline.

name: Arms Import Minimalist
title: Low Arms Imports
description: In 2022, Kenya's arms imports were valued at 1,000,000 SIPRI trend indicator values, indicating a low reliance on foreign military equipment.

name: Education Equality
title: Full Female Progression to Secondary School
description: In 2015, 100% of females progressed to secondary school in Kenya, showcasing a commitment to gender equality in education.
